content.text: Hey! My name is Mark and I am from the US. How are you?
Hello Mark! I am doing okay. My name is Sarah and I am from the UK. What do you do for work?
I am an animal rights activist. I also like to check out the latest aviation news and ballet events.
I work at a local party store. My pets are all rescues and they have brought so much joy into my life.
That's awesome! I love animals too. I have a dog and a cat. I am moving to a new house so I can have more space for my book collection.
I loved to ride my bike in the countryside with my dad. I am angry at my coworker.
That sounds like fun! I am an avid reader as well. I sometimes spend too much time procrastinating on my homework.
I am a lesbian. Do you have any hobbies?
Yes, I like to play video games and go to the gym. I am also in the process of learning a new language.
That's awesome! I have been wanting to learn a new language. I have a lot of homework to do tonight so I should probably get started.
Okay, it was nice talking to you Sarah. I hope you have a good day!
You too, Mark! It was nice talking to you as well
